meanings.definition: A person who maintains a golf course, specifically the putting greens.
meanings.sent1: The greenskeeper mowed the putting greens early in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The golf course hired a new greenskeeper to take care of the putting greens.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel played hide-and-seek with the greenskeeper on the putting greens.
meanings.sent4: The greenskeeper's dedication to the putting greens was like a painter meticulously crafting a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green of the putting greens under the care of the greenskeeper was a sight to behold.
